name: InstallMSITask
description: Installs an msi on the local machine
author: POFerro

inputs.name: msiFileName
inputs.label: MSI File Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the MSI file to install (ex: MyProductInstaller.msi)

inputs.name: msiProperties
inputs.label: MSI Properties
inputs.helpMarkDown: MSI properties sent as command line (ex: INSTALLFOLDER="c:\Program Files\MyProduct" MYPROPERTY=value)

inputs.name: logFilePath
inputs.label: Log File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Log file to be written by installation (ex: "c:\logs\msi.log")

inputs.name: logLevel
inputs.label: Log Level
inputs.helpMarkDown: Detail level of written log file
